title: Software Architecture Quiz
description: Design patterns, microservices, system design and architectural principles

questions.question: What is a microservice?
questions.explanation: A microservice is a small, independent service that can be deployed and scaled independently.

questions.question: What is the Repository pattern?
questions.explanation: The Repository pattern provides an abstraction layer between business logic and data access logic.

questions.question: Monolithic architecture is always worse than microservices.
questions.explanation: Monolithic architecture can be simpler and more appropriate for smaller applications. The choice depends on requirements.
